hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Build
ARCH=arm64 make buildroot-config make -C buildroot/arm64 -j$(nproc)
ARCH=arm make buildroot-config make -C buildroot/arm -j$(nproc)
ARCH=x86 make buildroot-config make -C buildroot/x86 -j$(nproc)

# Publish cpio
scp buildroot/arm/images/rootfs.cpio.gz loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/micro-rootfs/micro-rootfs-dev-arm.cpio.gz scp buildroot/arm64/images/rootfs.cpio.gz loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/micro-rootfs/micro-rootfs-dev-aarch64.cpio.gz scp buildroot/x86/images/rootfs.cpio.gz loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/micro-rootfs/micro-rootfs-dev-x86.cpio.gz
# Publis ext2 scp buildroot/arm/images/rootfs.ext2.gz loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/micro-rootfs/micro-rootfs-dev-arm.ext2.gz scp buildroot/arm64/images/rootfs.ext2.gz loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/micro-rootfs/micro-rootfs-dev-aarch64.ext2.gz scp buildroot/x86/images/rootfs.ext2.gz loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/micro-rootfs/micro-rootfs-dev-x86.ext2.gz
